oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Old Man, the Little Hare, and the Lions. Related by =giri-sse (L VII.-1. 6032-6040, partly translated). A fragment of the above story was also related by =giri-sse (L VII.-1. 6031). Explanatory note in the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L VII.-1. 6031 rev. and 6032 rev.). kumm
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The old man's song (written again separately, from =girri-sse's dictation)
